articles.description: Local bars across West Michigan prepared hours, even days ahead, for the Super Bowl LVII crowds.

articles.author: Harry Weber
articles.title: Freeport LNG in US exports first cargo since June 2022 fire: vessel tracking - S&P Global
articles.description: Freeport LNG exported its first cargo Feb. 12 since an explosion and fire shut the US liquefaction facility in June, S&P Global Commodity Insights data showed.
articles.content:
Freeport LNG exported its first cargo Feb. 12 since an explosion and fire shut the US liquefaction facility in June, S&P Global Commodity Insights data showed.
